revisions.rev:
{{Unreferenced|date=March 2007}} '''True Series''' is a [[Thailand|Thai]] television channel owned and produced by [[TrueVisions]]. It features series, lifestyle programs and reality shows from around the world. Most of the shows air in their original [[English language]] audio with subtitles in [[Thai language|Thai]] but there are also some [[Dubbing (filmmaking)|dubbed]] shows. '''True Series''' is available only on TrueVisions, channel 21.
The Channel is also considered the post popular in the Thai Region
[[Category:Television in Thailand]]
